Part of speech tagging Dependency parsing (Penn Treebank, Stanford CoreNLP\[cleanNLP\]) Tokenization

Week 4 tutorial:

# pull out the data we want

myData \<- docvars(data_corpus_inaugural) head(myData) tail(myData)

# now add the text to our data frame for running the annotation tool; column must be named `text`

myData\$text \<- text

annotated \<- cnlp_annotate(myData) head(annotated$token) head(annotated$document) annoData \<- left_join(annotated$document, annotated$token, by = "doc_id") head(annoData)

# plot length of documents (in sentences) over time

annoData %>% group_by(Year) %>% summarize(Sentences = max(sid)) %>% ggplot(aes(Year, Sentences)) + geom_line() + geom_smooth() + theme_bw()
